__e: Lavon, listen, I know this isn't the news you wanted to hear, but, I mean, you basically said the job just fell into your lap anyway, and...
Lavon, I realize that this is weird, but you're the only person who knows, so you are the only person that I can talk to. I'm sure there are others.
Listen, Lavon, I know that it's hard, but if you really care about her, you'll make it work.
Though Lavon Hayes wants nothing more than for all of this to be behind him, mayor can't let it happen, not in this storm.
Hello, uh, I-it's uh, me, mayor Lavon Hayes, and I-I can't wait to meet you, too. (CHUCKLES)
Lavon Hayes, although I love you, we... this...
